product.title: Christmas Elf Sleeping Bag
product.caption: Christmas Elf Sleeping Bag
info: A handmade christmas elf sleeping bag, perfect for your elf on the shelf.
Let your elves get all snuggled down ready for the night, before they start their mischief that is!
These sleeping bags are handmade from various Christmas fabrics and felt. We cannot guarantee the design of your sleeping bag as materials will vary. A random design will be sent.
If you have a specific request please feel free to contact us.
